thread.title: U.S. Government Bonds Fall as Signs of Inflation Appear

author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Government Bonds Fall as Signs of Inflation Appear

organizations.name: u.s. government bonds fall as signs of inflation appear

text:
U.S. government bond prices fell Thursday as investors assessed inflationary signals from rising prices for oil and steel helped push a market measure of inflation expectations to a multiyear high.
The yield on the benchmark Treasury 10-year note rose to 2.928%, according to Tradeweb, from 2.867% Wednesday. Yields rise as bond prices fall.
Bond...
